name: fuzzy-dream
description:
Tiny game made for the Mini Jam 80: Cats, with the added limitation of using 8x8 textures. Control Mc Snuffin and shoot invaders trying to take control over your tower. Build your tower higher by killing enemies. Did not have time to create any sound, might add it post-jam.

PICO-8

Woho, PICO-8 hype!

Limitation

The game is made in PICO-8 that has 8x8 tiles built-in within the editor. All sprites are made in this tile format and clipped together where needed in a tilemap. One exception is the cover image / title screen that uses higher resolution.
